title: stp插件应用
author: z234696818
txt_content:
Stp这个插件不会使用
谁教教我，
有多详细说多详细谢谢了
网上的看不懂

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
这里是网上，所以你看不懂。

原帖讲的很清楚了 https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=440107

就是配置文件中，设置下子服
#插件前缀
Prefix: "\xa7b\xa7l[\xa7a\xa7lStp\xa7b\xa7l] \xa7r\xa7f" 
BungeeCord:
??#大厅服务器
??LobbyServer: Lobby
??#服务器列表
??ServerList:
??- Example1
??- Example2
??- Example3
#语言设置
Language: Default复制代码
然后 /Stp 就能跨服传送

replies.author: z234696818
replies.txt_content:
那能不能帮我看看
我BC配置文件
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
player_limit: -1
stats: 551af500-7819-4447-baf1-cb34b2b39661
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
listeners:
- query_port: 2084
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: false
  default_server: lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  fallback_server: lobby
  host: 0.0.0.0:2084
  max_players: 1
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
timeout: 30000
connection_throttle: 4000
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:2086
    restricted: false
  kd:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:2087
    restricted: false
  RPG:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:2088
    restricted: false
  jy:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:2089
    restricted: false
  null:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:2085
    restricted: false
ip_forward: true
online_mode: false

replies.author: 手冲咖啡机
replies.txt_content: 这个插件直接放全部子服就可以了，指令是/stp 子服名字，主城也要放，其他指令也没有啥用。/lobby回主城，这个插件也不需要改配置，放所有子服就OK的
